analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho paritto
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na parittam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ parittaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe…
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na appamāṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
